regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re page_data = page_data.split('Golf schedule',1)[-1] page_data = page_data.split('Darts schedule',1)[0] s = re.findall('<h3>([^<]*)|box">([^<]*)(?s).*?ue="([^"]*)', page_data) return s
